text: This spectacle shop is a gem. The friendly staff, especially the sincere lady boss, is dedicated to helping me find the perfect glasses base on my  lifestyle and budget. Highly recommend!

have been getting my glasses done here, practically my whole life!
love the lady 老板娘 very friendly and helpful ☺️❤️

Made 3 pairs of reading glasses here. Wide choice of frames & very fast service. She even repaired a precious pair of glasses that my dog had chewed on. Thank you Cecilia! Excellent service & definitely recommended!

Extremely bad experience with this shop. Unhelpful lady whom conveniently forgotten to call to inform that my glasses was delayed for a further 2 days (I had to wait for a week plus 2 days)! Only to tell me in the face when I make a wasted trip down. Terrible service no wonder it's empty mostly!
Excellent neighbourhood glasses support. They make great Cycling glasses with great prices
